description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.zHgAiowY2vsjycXI]{Sepulchral (Niche)}

Once per round while you have 1 or more MP, when you deal damage with your adaptive strike to a living creature, you can increase the damage dealt to that creature by an amount equal to half your MP total, rounded up. This additional damage you deal increases to your MP total at 7th level, 1-1/2 × your MP total at 13th level, and 2 × your MP total at 19th level.
